attributes.action: reinstate Margaret Haywood to the nursing register immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurse of 20 years Margaret Haywood filmed undercover for BBC's Panorama exposing horrific NHS Management failings, which were broadcast in July 2005 as part of the "Undercover Nurses" program. At a hearing on April 16 she was unjustly removed from the Nursing Register, solely for her actions exposing these failings.

There is CLEARLY an overarching public interest in standards of care, and whistleblowers must be praised and encouraged, not punished. 

Filming was covert, but all those who were filmed later gave permission for images to be shown. 

Nurse Haywood's striking off is a gross injustice, the specific care homes filmed in the Panoram program have been discussed in the House of Commons. 

The background can be found on line (search for Margaret Haywood on any news site).
